bioconda.name: bioconductor-m3drop
bioconda.summary: Michaelis-Menten Modelling of Dropouts in single-cell RNASeq

biotools.summary: This package fits a Michaelis-Menten model to the pattern of dropouts in single-cell RNASeq data. This model is used as a null to identify significantly variable (i.e. differentially expressed) genes for use in downstream analysis, such as clustering cells.

bioschemas.name: M3Drop
bioschemas.summary: This package fits a Michaelis-Menten model to the pattern of dropouts in single-cell RNASeq data. This model is used as a null to identify significantly variable (i.e. differentially expressed) genes for use in downstream analysis, such as clustering cells.
